name: Define Project Scope
description: Clearly articulate the boundaries, objectives, and deliverables of the 'Dimas Realm' project to ensure everyone understands what is to be achieved.
purpose: Establishes a shared understanding of the project's purpose and limitations, preventing scope creep and misalignment.
applicability_notes: Essential at the beginning of any project, regardless of domain, to set clear expectations.
examples_of_usage: Initiating a new software development project

name: Identify Key Stakeholders
description: Determine all individuals, groups, or organizations that have an interest in or will be affected by the 'Dimas Realm' project.
purpose: Ensures that all relevant parties are considered and their needs or concerns can be addressed throughout the project lifecycle.
applicability_notes: Crucial for projects involving multiple teams, users, or external entities.

name: Establish Success Metrics
description: Define quantifiable measures that will be used to evaluate the success of the 'Dimas Realm' project upon completion.
purpose: Provides objective criteria for determining if the project has met its goals and delivered the expected value.
applicability_notes: Applicable to any project where the achievement of goals needs to be objectively assessed.
examples_of_usage: Measuring the ROI of an investment
Assessing the impact of a training program
Evaluating the performance of a new feature

name: Map Dependencies
description: Identify and document the relationships between different tasks, components, or phases within the 'Dimas Realm' project.
purpose: Helps in understanding the project's structure, identifying potential bottlenecks, and planning the sequence of activities.
applicability_notes: Important for complex projects with interlinked activities or components.

name: Outline Project Phases
description: Divide the 'Dimas Realm' project into distinct stages or phases, each with its own set of objectives and deliverables.
purpose: Provides a structured approach to project execution, allowing for better management, tracking, and control.
applicability_notes: Useful for managing projects of significant size or duration.

name: Allocate Resources
description: Identify and assign the necessary resources (human, financial, material) to each task or phase of the 'Dimas Realm' project.
purpose: Ensures that the project has the required means to be completed efficiently and effectively.
applicability_notes: Critical for projects with budget constraints or limited resource availability.

name: Develop Execution Strategy
description: Create a detailed plan outlining how the 'Dimas Realm' project will be carried out, including methodologies, tools, and processes.
purpose: Provides a clear roadmap for the project team, ensuring consistency and efficiency in execution.
applicability_notes: Essential for guiding the practical implementation of the project.
examples_of_usage: Choosing a software development methodology (e.g., Agile, Waterfall)

name: Implement Project Plan
description: Carry out the tasks and activities as defined in the 'Dimas Realm' project plan, adhering to the established strategy and timelines.
purpose: The core phase where the project's objectives are actively pursued and deliverables are created.
applicability_notes: The primary phase of any project where work is actively performed.

name: Monitor Progress and Performance
description: Continuously track the advancement of the 'Dimas Realm' project against the plan, identifying deviations and performance issues.
purpose: Ensures the project stays on track and allows for timely interventions to address problems and maintain quality.
applicability_notes: An ongoing activity throughout the project lifecycle.
examples_of_usage: Tracking sprint progress in Agile development

name: Review and Validate Deliverables
description: Examine the completed outputs of the 'Dimas Realm' project to ensure they meet the defined requirements, quality standards, and success criteria.
purpose: Confirms that the project has produced the intended results and meets the expectations of stakeholders before final acceptance.
applicability_notes: Performed at the end of phases or the entire project.
examples_of_usage: Final inspection of a construction site

name: Manage Project Changes
description: Establish a process for requesting, evaluating, approving, and implementing changes to the 'Dimas Realm' project scope, plan, or deliverables.
purpose: Controls the impact of changes, ensuring they are beneficial and do not jeopardize project success.
applicability_notes: Essential for projects where requirements may evolve or unforeseen issues arise.
examples_of_usage: Adding new features to a software product
Modifying project timelines due to external factors

name: Document Project Outcomes
description: Record the final results, lessons learned, and key information from the 'Dimas Realm' project for future reference.
purpose: Captures valuable knowledge and insights that can inform future projects and organizational improvement.
applicability_notes: Typically done at the project's conclusion, but can also occur at phase ends.
